subject: Haptic motor brake motor mount
description_text:
Hello, I bought your x plus pedal set they are wirking great so far, had sime interference but after installing the ground it was good. 
Before I bought your pedal set I did buy simagic big haptic motor for brake pedal and i need urgently U shaped bracket for simmson plus x brake pedal. You have 2 kinds of u shaped brackets eifer and narrower but no dimensions, which one fits for x plus and how to buy? Do you have them in german warehouse as were the pedals or do you have aliexpress store?
Many thanks
Ragnar

conversations.body_text: Hi Ragnar,     It currently supports the installation of all Simsonn motors and can be purchased directly from our official website. Since there is no stock in Germany at the moment, shipments can only be arranged from China.     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets
